overview: An unprecedented fight to protect the poor in small town Texas. Churches, nonprofits, and cities are taking action against the payday loan industry. This inspiring story examines how a group of Texans are fighting for change and vowed to protect their neighbors from loan sharks. In a time when political disillusionment is all around, this documentary serves as an important example of how the best, and worst, of our political system can unite a community.
title: The Ordinance
